name: CHAOS CONSTRUCTOR
description:
Controlls:

  • C- Change character direction
  • Space- Jump
  • P- Pause
  • 8-Reset
  • B-Mute Music

For the Mini Jam 74: Chaos

This is my first finished game ever. It was a lot of fun and i learned a lot. I did't get as much chaos in there as i would have hoped. I hope the clunky controlls will provide you with enough chaos :)

A big thank you too all my friends who playtested it and got through these awfull controlls.

Thank you Alexander for the Musik. Click here to get his Youtube profile.

Also thanks to my brother. He was like a mother to me.

Here is the Background i used. After this and the musik i did everything myself.
